fields.description:
Android: Accessibility: Accessibility for slider control with hidden attribute to be true, device should not read anything out. 
This is not a regression. Issue occurs since 2.0.2.GA
Steps to reproduce:
1. Run the app Accessibility Acceptance Access_1107
2. Touch fourth progress bar (with accessibility hidden)

Expected:
On touching the progress bar the device does not read aloud anything.

Actual:
Device Reads out the progress bar attributes.
fields.summary: Android: Accessibility: Accessibility for slider control with hidden attribute to be true, device should not read anything out.
